title: A Haunted Diary
description: Based on True EventsMy house was well known for various paranormal activities. Over time friends and family tried to ignore the unexplained occurrences, but some of the spirits would not be ignored. The demon that followed my family and I for over 12 years at times demanded attention.This book is a diary of the daily events regarding the paranormal experiences that happened everyday in my house and my experiences as a ghost hunter.
author: Amanda Springer
